name: gmoonc
description: Goalmoon Ctrl (gmoonc): Complete dashboard installer for React projects

scripts.build: tsup src/cli/index.ts --format cjs --no-splitting --out-dir dist && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const f='dist/cli.js';const cjs='dist/cli.cjs';if(fs.existsSync(f)){fs.renameSync(f,cjs);fs.writeFileSync(cjs,'#!/usr/bin/env node\n'+fs.readFileSync(cjs))}"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
